content: Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked on 27 May 2018Which bank account should I park my savings money of $10K to just grow and gain interest (not gonna touch or deposit further anymore)?4 answersAnswerBump1
Answers (4)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Kenneth LouLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 30 May 2018People keep asking this same question haha. It's really simple :) you can use this Savings account calculator to find out! (https://seedly.sg/tools/savings-account-calculator)​Long story short, you'll find that it is the easiest to park it in a CIMB FastSaver to get 1% p.a flat!0 comments2

Gabriel ThamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 27 May 2018A bank account that you don't need to do anything to get interest?​CIMB Fastsaver. Literally do nothing to get 1% interest. By far the best no frills account.0 comments2
Steph YeoLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 08 Jun 2018Would you consider the Singapore Savings Bond instead? Current interest rates are quite high for even short term like 1-3 years.0 comments1
Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 14 Jun 2018Agree with Steph. If you have no use for it, FD or SSB may be a better bet.0 comments0
